thread.title: Fantasy Gear for Every Walk of Life

author: Joe Queenan
title: Fantasy Gear for Every Walk of Life
text:
Seeking to avoid what one businessman calls “diaper-bag emasculation,” fathers of newborns are increasingly garbing themselves in camouflage gear. As reported in the Journal, companies with names like Tactical Baby Gear and HighSpeedDaddy now make diaper bags perfect for carrying ordnance and baby carriers and vests that look like something out of “Apocalypse Now.”
The companies doing this are essentially selling fantasy costumes—making it seem cool, perhaps even dangerous, to care for a drooling baby. Previously, parenting...
